snippet: The school needs to take a much harder look at its own culpability in the death of a marching band member by hazing.
abstract: Editorial charges that even though criminal charges have finally been filed against the 13 people allegedly responsible for the hazing death of Florida A&M band member Robert Champion, the school needs to take a much harder look at its own culpability.
lead_paragraph: The school needs to take a much harder look at its own culpability in the death of a marching band member by hazing.

headline.seo: What Is Wrong at Florida A&M?
headline.main: What Is Wrong at Florida A&M?
headline.print_headline: What Is Wrong at Florida A&M?
